Superb app for fine-tuning search results and directing customers to the right products. Requires a little work to setup various filters and boosts, but once they are in place search results on our store are significantly more helpful.

Hello, the app has a big disadvantage. It supports the metafields for filtering (very good). But only in the native language. If you change the language within the online shop the filters are shown still in the native language. All metafields has been translated in all languages by an additional app. Bad Bad Bad. When will you make the filtering international?
Downloaded the app simple set up can't wait to see how it will help my customers find their product with ease.
yaptığı iş çok iyi, ek olarak ücretsiz olduğunu da düşünürsek mükemmel. biraz liquid bilgisi ile çok profesyonel işler yapabilirsiniz. teşekkürler shopify.
this app I think is good and helps me to make my store in Shopify, and I need help to make a good store, thanks Shopify.

I just got the Search and Discover app attached to my Shop Store! It is tedious to get all the rules and regs right the first time, but the results are wonderful! I am so happy to see my products added to Shop button. I appreciate this opportunity to gather customers and sales!! Thank you so much.

I'm impressed with the auto-recommendations that this provides. Our store has a lot of product types and will have almost 20,000 items, and while I can't say that we've made our tags super specific, the app is still able to recommend similar products. Yes, it probably doesn't work on all themes yet (I'm using Minimog). But this app deserves much credit. I hope in the future Shopify will make it so that it can support filter on any amount of products, not just 1,000. (To overcome this, I currently use Minimog's built-in custom tag filter)

Applicazione utile e intuitiva. Indubbiamente necessaria per migliorare l'agganciamento dei prodotti simili, il cosiddetto ti potrebbero piacere. Aumenta il volume degli affari e aiuta il cliente a navigare all'interno del proprio negozio web.
Good, it gave me suggestions to improve my Page and my search.Loved it and especially the filter and suggestion for customize products showed what customers are looking in complementary
The app works perfectly for me, straightforward setup and a very friendly UI.I really don't understand the bad reviews

This app handles so much complexity that I don't have time to deal with as a business owner. The auto-generated recommendations are on point. It makes merchandizing, and search and discovery so much better.
A very nice app, they have solved a lot of their previous problems. Also you can now edit fields via bulk edit apps.Would appreciate for design options for the filters view
Very useful app. I wish people wouldn't leave negative reviews simply because they don't know how to use certain features.
excelente, atende as necessidades, é intuitivo e com um visual não agressivo, muito bom recomendo hoje
** [Updated Review] I have tested the sorting on our site and it is now sorted based on the order of the metafield values list. I appreciate your team quickly finding and correcting this bug!

"I highly recommend this searching app to anyone looking for a quick and efficient way to find what they need. The app is user-friendly, with a clean and easy-to-use interface that makes searching a breeze. The app's search algorithm is top-notch, producing relevant results in a matter of seconds. Additionally, the app offers various filters and sorting options to help narrow down search results. Overall, this searching app is a must-have for anyone looking to streamline their search process."
Die App ist einfach aber bietet trotzdem viele Möglichkeiten. Sie ist benutzerfreundlich und verbessert das Einkaufserlebnis des Kunden.
Great app search and filter service app we checked all the features and shopify make a great app and easy to work

It's a really good app. Allowing for synonyms is a huge plus and we even get insights into what customers are searching for in our store. Not really sure what they would need to improve on honestly. Overall, 10 out of 10 :)

This app is really great! It is Shopifys app so it works very well and I am very satisfied with the result that I got at my store! I really recommend everyone to use this app cause it is a free app and it works very well.
Great to see that you can now filter your collection products and even use metafields without having to purchase a separate app.BuyExcelTemplates.com
Great way to boost products with larger inventory on Search and to upsell & grow average order value on each sale.

This app certainly does what it says on the box. I am a simple person and like my solutions simple. I am more than happy to change my requirements to suit the technical implementation. Rather not bend and break things. It also makes it all easy to manage and it's a Shopify app. The filtering here works perfectly and I am sure Shopify are going to continue development on this. Not sure why this is rated so low.
I enjoyed the easiness in working with this app! I'm not exactly tech savvy but this ticks all that I need to get going.

A+++, my #1 favorite, most valued app...and the fact that its FREE!? I love the functionality & added features this app provides. I'm so happy to see whatever glitch / update that disallowed control over auto-generated recommendations has not only been fixed, but improved it seems at first glance.

This has been a blessing to put multiple things together. We're a new start up and don't need the complications that involve getting products from other vendors or drop shipping. We just need to say "X pairs well with Y and Z" and this does that perfectly for our basic needs. I'm busy editing all of my products to use this feature.
Brilliant App . Best app to use the filter feature in store and to enable the all feature like filter by vendor, filter by tag, filter by colors, filter by size etc options
Nice start for the app, Only feature really missing is the ability to do product recommendations based on variants.

It's good that shopify finally allows for product selection on the product recommendations which is an important feature. Would be even better if - We can select number of products to be shown- Scrollable options like carousel

Good beginnings of a decent app, and always better to use one created by Shopify directly in the admin. The new related items + complementary items section is brilliant. Requires a few more things to be a perfect solution, however: 1. Colour groupingThe colour filter is not quite ideal as it shows "all colour variants" so your filter will show "White" "Gloss White" "Matt White" etc, rather than just the group "White" which is what customers would expect to see. 2. URL Re-directs - Someone searching "Nike", being directed to the Nike page, rather than Nike results. 3. Stop wordsWords that don't add anything to relate to products like "discount" or "cheap" to be ignored from search results. 4. AnalyticsThings like 0 results and most searches etc and where to improve.

This app is just what we needed. We find that many customers do the majority of their browsing going directly through the related items rather than navigating the entire site. Now people are spending a lot more time browsing uninterrupted, and we're able to show far more relevant things (like things with a similar ingredient list)... and not things that seem completely random because other people have bought them together. Not being able to customize related items was one of my biggest peeves about Shopify, second only to a lack of one-page checkout. The synonyms didn't seem to work when I first installed it, but all good now. People make typos or misspell things and come up empty-handed. Previously I would sprinkle some common misspellings in descriptions or switch between using a hyphen or not, so people would always be able to find something. Eww. Problem solved. :) I can't speak to the filter settings - we use tag filters, so they're not relevant for us. Only complaint is that I can't seem to sort the products that I've added related items to. It would be nice to be able to search or list alphabetical. It's a real pain to browse page after page to track something down if I want to update it.
It's quite basic but hoping it will get more interesting later. PS: What is 'Denomination' and how do we set it up please? Thx!

It's nice finally having easy access to the search and filter settings. I just tried the synonym dictionary and it worked instantly. The filter system is the same as it was in the navigation menu, but it's in a pinnable app. No complaints.
Straightforward and easy to use. Makes it a lot easier to add filters and customize search results.

I am happy Shopify finally allows us to display more than 1,000 products. That is a huge improvement. Thank you!! And it's very simple to use. Update: I needed sizes to sort in a specific order and the team made it happen for me. These guys are awesome. My filters are perfect now. And you can't beat the price :)
Amazing to have the tools at arms reach and in one location. Im trying out this app to improve my search and so far it’s straight forward and user friendly
We really like this app and would recommend it to others! It’s super easy to use, provides our customers with more functionality, and enhances the professionalism / usability of our store!

Edit: They fixed the issue instantly, thanks. Hey, if I write the option of my product in several capital letters, it is shown in the search folder after the first word completely in small letters. have a nice evening

I am happy Shopify finally allows us to display more than 1,000 products. That is a huge improvement. Thank you!! And it's very simple to use. Now, if i could get my product options to sort, that would be awesome. For example, I'd like to...
I used this app and its works perfectly for my website. Better than most of the apps with high promises and no usefulness.

UPDATE: the app works fine, everything is easy to use and to the point, you have only to edit a little bit your filters and filter metafields (if you use) and then it works perfect. new app = new featuresi can't wait to see what's next.

Like the review before mine, I had no idea where it came from. However, after reaching out to Shopify they clarified that the app was a new functionality for our store, and assured us it would not slow down our store. The app seems to work fine, and I did notice it made my store look more professional. Thanks Shopify!
